name: Shopping with your partner
description:
Keep your partner happy and collect bags to get points.

Summary

  • 8 Levels + Tutorial
  • local highscore
  • collect bags to get points
  • stay near to your partner or buy a gift to increase mood
  • up to 4 partners at one time
  • if your hungry or thirsty your walking speed decreases
  • don't run out of money

Controls

  • wasd - move character
  • space - use objects
  • esc - pause
